abstract: In Florida, Gov. Rick Scott has suggested redirecting college funds from departments like anthropology to what he considers more practical disciplines like technology and math.
snippet: In Florida, Gov. Rick Scott has suggested redirecting college funds from departments like anthropology to what he considers more practical disciplines like technology and math.
lead_paragraph: Those students interested in studying anthropology in college may want to do their homework before choosing to do so at a public institution in Florida.

headline.main: Florida Governor Wants Funds to Go to Practical Degrees
